entries.source: Git is not ready. When all settings are correct you can configure commit-sync, etc.
entries.translated: Git还没有准备好。当所有设置都正确时，您可以配置提交同步等。

entries.source: Show the author of the commit in the history view.
entries.translated: 在历史视图中显示提交的作者。

entries.source: Show the date of the commit in the history view. The {{date}} placeholder format is used to display the date.
entries.translated: 在历史视图中显示提交的日期。使用 {{date}} 占位符格式来显示日期。

entries.source: Automatically refresh source control view on file changes
entries.translated: 文件更改时自动刷新源控制视图

entries.source: On slower machines this may cause lags. If so, just disable this option.
entries.translated: 在较慢的机器上，这可能会导致延迟。如果是这样，请禁用此选项。

entries.source: Milliseconds to wait after file change before refreshing the Source Control View.
entries.translated: 在文件更改后等待的毫秒数，然后刷新源控制视图。

entries.source: Set the style for the diff view. Note that the actual diff in "Split" mode is not generated by Git, but the editor itself instead so it may differ from the diff generated by Git. One advantage of this is that you can edit the text in that view.
entries.translated: 设置差异视图的样式。请注意，“拆分”模式中的实际差异不是由 Git 生成的，而是由编辑器本身生成的，因此可能与 Git 生成的差异不同。这样做的一个优点是您可以在该视图中编辑文本。

entries.source: Disable informative notifications for git operations to minimize distraction (refer to status bar for updates).
entries.translated: 禁用 Git 操作的信息性通知，以减少干扰（请参阅状态栏以获取更新）。

entries.source: Disable error notifications of any kind to minimize distraction (refer to status bar for updates).
entries.translated: 禁用任何类型的错误通知，以减少干扰（请参阅状态栏以获取更新）。

entries.source: Don't show notifications when there are no changes to commit or push.
entries.translated: 当没有需要提交或推送的更改时，不显示通知。

entries.source: Obsidian must be restarted for the changes to take affect.
entries.translated: Obsidian 必须重新启动以使更改生效。

entries.source: Add "Stage", "Unstage" and "Add to .gitignore" actions to the file menu.
entries.translated: 向文件菜单添加“暂存”、“取消暂存”和“添加到 .gitignore”操作。

entries.source: Show the count of modified files in the status bar
entries.translated: 显示状态栏中修改文件的数量

entries.source: These settings usually don't need to be changed, but may be required for special setups.
entries.translated: 这些设置通常无需更改，但在特殊配置中可能需要。

entries.source: "Commit-and-sync" and "pull" takes care of submodules. Missing features: Conflicted files, count of pulled/pushed/committed files. Tracking branch needs to be set for each submodule.
entries.translated: “提交和同步”以及“拉取”处理子模块。缺失的功能：冲突文件、拉取/推送/提交文件的数量。每个子模块需要设置跟踪分支。
自定义 Git 二进制文件路径

entries.source: Use each line for a new environment variable in the format KEY=VALUE .
entries.translated: 使用每一行作为新环境变量，格式为 KEY=VALUE。
其他 PATH 环境变量路径

entries.source: Use each line for one path

entries.translated: 重新加载新的环境变量

entries.source: Removing previously added environment variables will not take effect until Obsidian is restarted.
entries.translated: 移除之前添加的环境变量直到 Obsidian 重启才生效。
自定义基础路径（Git 仓库路径）

entries.source: Sets the relative path to the vault from which the Git binary should be executed. Mostly used to set the path to the Git repository, which is only required if the Git repository is below the vault root directory. Use "\" instead of "/" on Windows.
entries.translated: 设置 Git 二进制文件应从哪个存储库执行的相对路径。主要用于设置 Git 仓库的路径，只有当 Git 仓库位于分库根目录之下时才需要。在 Windows 下使用“\\”代替“/”。
自定义 Git 目录路径（取代 .git）

entries.source: Requires restart of Obsidian to take effect. Use "\" instead of "/" on Windows.
entries.translated: 需要重启 Obsidian 才能生效。在 Windows 上使用“\\”而不是“/”。

entries.source: Disables the plugin on this device. This setting is not synced.
entries.translated: 禁用此设备上的插件。此设置不会同步。

entries.source: If you like this Plugin, consider donating to support continued development.
entries.translated: 如果你喜欢这个插件，可以考虑捐赠来支持继续开发。

entries.source: Debugging and logging: You can always see the logs of this and every other plugin by opening the console with
entries.translated: 调试和日志记录：使用以下命令打开控制台，即可查看本插件和其他所有插件的日志
